name: Run Around Game
description:
Run up walls and ceilings, avoid spikes, and collect all the flags. This game is for the Game Off 2018 game jam and was built for both Windows and for browsers with WebAssembly and Emscripten (a "hybrid" of two platforms). The game engine, renderers, and art assets were made from scratch.

Use WASD and space to move, or use the on-screen buttons on mobile.
